South Texas. 1882. Billy Candle has just turned 19 and he stands accused of 
murdering his mother and stepfather. Hot on his trail is Reverend Ray McCall, 
his stepfather?s brother and an infamous gunfighter who believes the Lord has 
chosen him to be Billy?s judge, jury and executioner. Call of Juarez is an epic 
western adventure about vengeance, survival and the search for a legendary 
lost treasure.
The game features fast paced revolver duels using historically accurate firearms, 
horseback riding, mounted combat and stealth actions in memorable locations set 
after Western movies.
